directions.step:
Spread butter evenly in an 8- or 9-inch pie pan. Sprinkle Baker's Coconut into the pan and pat evenly into the butter. Bake in modorate oven (350Ã¸F.) until crisp and golden brown (10 to 12 minutes). Cool.
To serve--fill crust with your favorite flavor of Jell-O Pudding and Pie Filling, made according to package directins, and chill until firm. Or fill with ice cream and serve immediately.
